local_docs.title: Source-to-source transformation server V1.15i for SPARC (~3.9Mb)
Source-to-source transformation server V1.15i for x86 (~1.2Mb)
EOS hill-climbing auto-tuning example (padding, tiling, unrolling) (jpg)

notes.note: Developed during EU FP5 MHAOTEU project [$#cm_c47ad9a552aa7e82_0dd07d427c84c0f6#$] and PhD studies [$#cm_e50b2aeb0e771b47_af47af80ffcc4f40#$]
Used in first experiments to predict complex optimizations (not just 1 transformation) using machine learning and program semantic and dynamic features (hardware counters)

Discontinued for compilers with Interactive Compilation Interface or OpenME [$#cm_d76ac3bb9a3f744c_30489f4f8a9c7b1d#$, $#cm_d76ac3bb9a3f744c_e86cc5214c0a90df#$, $#cm_d76ac3bb9a3f744c_b83d269b514aa588#$]
